name: Law Of Mass Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
take out the vivarium box
place the vivariums on the four scales on both arms
place a glass tube on the right two-armed scale
shrink down and enter the portal to the right side of the left scale
make a fire
go outside through the portal 
observe the left scale from outside.
enter the open portal to the right
start a fire
use the portal to go outside.
go outside and observe the scales on both arms
<Result 
Burning wood, charcoal, and candles: Burning wood, charcoal, and candles produces water vapor and...
